ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores Statement Opening Dates and Opening Balances of Account Statements for statement cycles greater than 1.

desc.p: This system updated table stores Statement Opening Dates and Opening Balances of Account Statements for statement cycles greater than 1.
For Account Statement with Cycle No. 2, the key of this table would be a valid Account record key.
For Account Statements with Cycle No. greater than 2 (upto 9), key of this table would have two components, a valid Account record key and the Account Statement Cycle No. both joined by a '.'

Specifies the Statement Opening Date and Opening Balance of Account Statements for statement cycles greater than 1. The Opening Date is in the format YYYYMMDD. The Opening Date and Opening Balance are separated by a '/'
